Package cpsc2150.extendedConnectX.models

Interface IGameBoard

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbsGameBoard, GameBoard, GameBoardMem
    public interface IGameBoard
    Interface holds and maintains the information required for a connectX board and the operations that occur

    • Method Detail

      • checkIfFree

        default boolean checkIfFree​(int c)
        This method checks to see if the column can accept a token
        Parameters:
        c - - the column we would like to place the token in
        Returns:
        iff (c == ' ') then true AND iff else then false

      • placeToken

        void placeToken​(char p,
                int c)

      • checkForWin

        default boolean checkForWin​(int c)
        This method checks to see if the last token placed in the column won the game
        Parameters:
        c - - the column we would like to place the token in
        Returns:
        iff c placed wins game then true AND iff else than false

      • checkTie

        default boolean checkTie()
        This method checks the board for open spots to see if there is a tie
        Returns:
        true iff no open spots left and false iff otherwise

      • checkHorizWin

        default boolean checkHorizWin​(BoardPosition pos,
                              char p)
        This method checks to see if the last token placed resulted in a horizontal win
        Parameters:
        pos - - position of the token on the board
        p - - the character that would take up the spot
        Returns:
        true iff NUM_TO_WIN in a row horizontally AND false iff otherwise

      • checkVertWin

        default boolean checkVertWin​(BoardPosition pos,
                             char p)
        This method checks to see if the last token placed resulted in a vertical win
        Parameters:
        pos - - position of the token on the board
        p - - the character that would take up the spot
        Returns:
        true iff NUM_TO_WIN in a row vertically AND false iff otherwise

      • checkDiagWin

        default boolean checkDiagWin​(BoardPosition pos,
                             char p)
        This method checks to see if the last token placed resulted in a diagonal win
        Parameters:
        pos - - position of the token on the board
        p - - the character that would take up the spot
        Returns:
        true iff NUM_TO_WIN in a row diagonally AND false iff otherwise

      • whatsAtPos

        char whatsAtPos​(BoardPosition pos)

      • isPlayerAtPos

        default boolean isPlayerAtPos​(BoardPosition pos,
                              char player)
        This method checks to see if player is at the position selected
        Parameters:
        pos - - position of the token on the board
        player - - variable for player to move on board
        Returns:
        true iff (player == pos) AND iff otherwise then false
